newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA V ZIMBABWE TOSS/TEAMS.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-SOUTH AFRICA V ZIMBABWE TOSS/TEAMS.

text.p: Zimbabwe won the toss and chose to bat in the triangular series one-day match against South Africa on Wednesday.
South Africa - Gary Kirsten, Andrew Hudson, Lance Klusener, Daryll Cullinan, Jonty Rhodes, Hansie Cronje (captain), Shaun Pollock, Dave Richardson, Pat Symcox, Rudi Bryson, Allan Donald.
Zimbabwe - Grant Flower, Andy Waller, Andy Flower, Paul Strang, Alistair Campbell (captain), David Houghton, Guy Whittall, Craig Evans, Heath Streak, Eddo Brandes, John Rennie.
